original_text:
Ankh of Anubis
Il tema Antico Egitto fa di nuovo la sua comparsa nel mondo delle slot machine con questo nuovo gioco della software house Play’N’Go: Ankh of Anubis è infatti incentrata sulla figura della divinità Anubi, leggendario dio egiziano rappresentato con sembianze per metà umane e per metà canine.
Prima di addentrarci nelle caratteristiche della slot, ricordiamo che avete la possibilità di provare questo nuovo gioco in versione demo e scoprirne tutti i trucchi e i segreti prima di scommettere denaro vero.
Come detto, la tematica non brilla certo per originalità, ma è sostenuta da un compartimento grafico molto ben strutturato, con immagini curatissime e uno sfondo in cui sono riprodotte le piramidi in uno stile particolarmente futuristico.
Alle immagini si aggiunge una colonna sonora coerente con il tema e affascinante, che porta il giocatore virtualmente all’ombra delle piramidi ma allo stesso tempo favorisce la concentrazione durante gli spins!
Modalità di gioco di Ankh of Anubis
La struttura di gioco di Ankh of Anubis è abbastanza tradizionale, se si esclude la particolarità data dal fatto che mentre sui due rulli esterni sono presenti solamente tre simboli, su quelli centrali ce en sono invece cinque. Le combinazioni vincenti si ottengono, come quasi sempre accade, quando sui rulli adiacenti compaiono dei simboli identici, per allineamenti che vanno da sinistra verso destra.
I simboli si ispirano alla cultura egiziana e includono la croce della vita, una piramide, lo scarabeo d’oro e altri amuleti; oltre a questi sono presenti i numeri e le lettere che si riferiscono alle carte da gioco, stavolta solamente dal J all’Asso.
Il simbolo Wild del gioco è rappresentato dalla testa del dio Anubi con sembianze canine che, oltre a essere il jolly che può sostituire tutti gli altri simboli tranne lo Scatter per realizzare delle combinazioni vincenti, consente anche di accedere a una funzione speciale in cui acquisisce maggior valore.
Lo Scatter del gioco è invece una chiave, che se compare sui rulli almeno per tre volte regala un numero variabile di giri gratuiti; in questo caso l’unica particolarità è data dal fatto che per il primo giro gratuito non potranno essere presenti sui rulli degli ulteriori simboli Scatter.
I giri gratuiti rappresentano una ghiotta possibilità per ottenere delle vincite sostanziose: durante i free spins infatti potrete usufruire di ricchi moltiplicatori che potranno regalarvi dei premi con un valore fino a 15.000 volte la vostra puntata!
Autoplay e RTP
Se vi piacciono le slot machine che funzionano anche in modalità automatica, Ankh of Anubis è una di queste e vi dà la possibilità di impostare grazie alla funzione Autoplay il numero di giri gratuiti che desiderate: a questo punto non vi resterà che osservare i rulli che girano e incrociare le dita sperando nella buona sorte!
Il ritorno teorico al giocatore di Ankh of Anubis si attesta su una percentuale del 96,2%: non possiamo dire che sia alta ma sicuramente è in linea con la maggior parte delle altre slot machine che potrete trovare online sulle varie piattaforme di gioco!

raw_translation.response:
Ankh of Anubis

The theme of Ancient Egypt makes yet another appearance in the world of slot machines with this new game from Play’N’Go: Ankh of Anubis is centered on the figure of the god Anubis, the legendary Egyptian deity depicted with the likeness of half-human and half-canine.

Before delving into the features of the slot game, remember that you have the opportunity to try out this new game in demo version and discover all the tricks and secrets before betting real money.

As mentioned, the theme doesn't shine for originality, but it is supported by a very well-structured graphic department, with finely crafted images and a background that reproduces the pyramids in a particularly futuristic style.

The images are accompanied by a soundtrack consistent with the theme and fascinating, which virtually takes the player to the shade of the pyramids but at the same time favors concentration during spins!

Gameplay of Ankh of Anubis

The game structure of Ankh of Anubis is quite traditional, excluding the peculiarity given by the fact that while only three symbols are present on the outer two reels, there are five on the central ones. Winning combinations are obtained, as almost always, when identical symbols appear on adjacent reels, for alignments that go from left to right.

The symbols are inspired by Egyptian culture and include the Ankh symbol for the cross of life, a pyramid, the golden scarab, and other amulets; in addition to these, there are also numbers and letters that refer to playing cards, this time only from Jack to Ace.

The game's Wild symbol is represented by the head of the god Anubis with canine features, which, in addition to being the wildcard that can replace all other symbols except for the Scatter to form winning combinations, also allows access to a special function in which it acquires greater value.

The game's Scatter is instead a key, which if it appears on the reels at least three times, gives a variable number of free spins; in this case, the only peculiarity is given by the fact that for the first free spin, there cannot be any additional Scatter symbols on the reels.

Free spins represent an excellent opportunity to obtain substantial winnings: during free spins, in fact, you can take advantage of rich multipliers that can give you prizes with a value of up to 15,000 times your bet!

Autoplay and RTP

If you like slot machines that also work in automatic mode, Ankh of Anubis is one of them and gives you the possibility to set the number of free spins you want thanks to the Autoplay function: at this point, you just have to watch the wheels spin and cross your fingers hoping for good luck!

The theoretical return to player of Ankh of Anubis is 96.2%: we cannot say that it is high, but it is certainly in line with most of the other slot machines that you can find online on various gaming platforms!

Ankh of Anubis follows a traditional gameplay structure. The symbols are inspired by ancient Egyptian culture and the playing cards from Jack to Ace. Winning combinations occur when identical symbols appear on adjacent reels, left to right. The game symbols in Ankh of Anubis represent Egyptian culture and include the Ankh symbol, pyramid, the golden scarab, and other amulets, in addition to playing cards (from Jack to Ace). The Wild symbol in Ankh of Anubis is the head of the god Anubis, which acts as a wildcard and can replace all other symbols except for the Scatter to form winning combinations. The game's Scatter symbol is a key, which if it appears on the reels three times or more, triggers a variable number of free spins, with the remarkable feature that for the first free spin, there cannot be any additional Scatter symbols on the reels. During free spins mode, you can unlock multipliers that increase winning potentials, up to 15,000 times more than your bet!

Symbol Design and Theme:

The theme of Ankh of Anubis is based around the Egyptian god Anubis. The graphics development is highly detailed, with finely crafted images and a futuristic pyramid-styled background. The symbols pay homage to the Egyptian culture and include standard 10-Ace playing-card values, the Ankh symbol for the cross of life, the golden scarab, and pyramid, amongst other amulets. Anubis, with canine features, represents the Wild symbol and can replace all other symbols except the Scatter. The Scatter symbol takes the form of a key, unlockable by appearing on the reels three times or more, to trigger free spins. The sound effects are consistent with the theme, which transports the player to the shade of the pyramids while spinning the reels.

Bonuses and Multipliers:

Ankh of Anubis offers regular wins achieved by landing identical symbols on adjacent reels, left to right. The Wild, represented by Anubis, increases winning potentials by replacing other symbols and can trigger a special feature where it acquires greater value. Land the Scatter on the reels three times or more to enter the free spins mode, which has no cap on the number of times it can be retriggered. During free spins, there are multipliers which can add to your winning amount, increasing the potential win up to 15,000 times your wagered amount.

Autoplay Function:

Ankh of Anubis features an Autoplay function that allows players to set the number of automatic spins they desire. Watch the spins play out and test your luck while taking a break from manually spinning the reels.

Demo Mode and Return to Player:

Ankh of Anubis has a demo mode giving players the opportunity to try out the game before wagering real funds. The theoretical return to player (RTP) percentage of the game is 96.2%, which may not be the highest but certainly falls in line with many of the online slot games found across various gaming platforms.

Review: Ankh of Anubis

The theme of Ancient Egypt makes yet another appearance in the world of slot machines with this new game from Play’N’Go: Ankh of Anubis is centered on the figure of the god Anubis, the legendary Egyptian deity depicted with the likeness of half-human and half-canine.

Before delving into the features of the slot game, remember that you have the opportunity to try out this new game in demo version and discover all the tricks and secrets before betting real money.

As mentioned, the theme doesn't shine for originality, but it is supported by a very well-structured graphic department, with finely crafted images and a background that reproduces the pyramids in a particularly futuristic style.

The images are accompanied by a soundtrack consistent with the theme and fascinating, which virtually takes the player to the shade of the pyramids but at the same time favors concentration during spins!

Gameplay of Ankh of Anubis

The game structure of Ankh of Anubis is quite traditional, excluding the peculiarity given by the fact that while only three symbols are present on the outer two reels, there are five on the central ones. Winning combinations are obtained, as almost always, when identical symbols appear on adjacent reels, for alignments that go from left to right.

The symbols are inspired by Egyptian culture and include the Ankh symbol for the cross of life, a pyramid, the golden scarab, and other amulets; in addition to these, there are also numbers and letters that refer to playing cards, this time only from Jack to Ace.

The game's Wild symbol is represented by the head of the god Anubis with canine features, which, in addition to being the wildcard that can replace all other symbols except for the Scatter to form winning combinations, also allows access to a special function in which it acquires greater value.

The game's Scatter is instead a key, which if it appears on the reels at least three times, gives a variable number of free spins; in this case, the only peculiarity is given by the fact that for the first free spin, there cannot be any additional Scatter symbols on the reels.

Free spins represent an excellent opportunity to obtain substantial winnings: during free spins, in fact, you can take advantage of rich multipliers that can give you prizes with a value of up to 15,000 times your bet!

Autoplay and RTP

If you like slot machines that also work in automatic mode, Ankh of Anubis is one of them and gives you the possibility to set the number of free spins you want thanks to the Autoplay function: at this point, you just have to watch the wheels spin and cross your fingers hoping for good luck!

The theoretical return to player of Ankh of Anubis is 96.2%: we cannot say that it is high, but it is certainly in line with most of the other slot machines that you can find online on various gaming platforms!
